demo_questions.question: How do I get started with this software?
How do I troubleshoot common issues?
Where can I find the installation guide?
What features are available in the latest version?

sample_responses.getting_started: To get started, please refer to the Quick Start Guide in Chapter 1 of the user manual. The basic steps include: 1) Installation, 2) Initial configuration, 3) First-time setup wizard.
sample_responses.fallback: I don't have enough information in the uploaded documents to answer that question accurately. Please upload relevant user guides or documentation.
